Based on your preferences, I would recommend watching "Jumper". This film stars Tom Hulce and Hayden Christensen, who are both excellent actors. 

The plot of "Jumper" is pretty simple: A young man named Joe (Hayden Christensen) discovers that he can teleport short distances between buildings. 

However, this power also comes with a heavy price tag. When Joe tries to use his powers for good, he finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

Despite its simplicity, "Jumper" is actually a pretty decent film. The acting by both Hayden Christensen and Tom Hulce is quite good, and they really manage to bring Joe's character across the screen in a very convincing manner.

Overall, I would definitely recommend watching "Jumper". This is a pretty decent film, with some good acting by both Hayden Christensen and Tom Hulce.
